name: Blob Blast: Intelligent Aliens
description:
Blob Blast with another twist! The aliens seem to be... smart!

In this all-new (like always) Blob Blast game, you start with 3 turrets and the blobs will dodge your lasers! Jump in! Blast 'em!

All Blob Blast games:

Blob Blast: Intelligent Aliens (this game)

Blob Blast: REGEN

Blob Blast 4

Blob Blasts 1-3
